_description: A Tale of King Edward (?III) and the Shepherd — ninety-one 12-line stanzas

CULFf548.First Lines:
God þat sittis in triniteGyffe thaym grace wel to
                    the…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…when þat we met ȝiftermoroweI had not ben in
                    þis bale
